attributes.action: Stop borrowing massive amounts of money,leaving my generation to pay back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government are borrowing around £33,000 for every man,woman and child in the UK at the moment.

This government has borrowed more money that every other government combined and they are leaving a massive debt for my generation to payback. 

This must stop now!

rejection.details: Please be more specific about what action you would like taken and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
